        public void sendMessage(Message message)
                 throws NetworkingException

        Send the given message. Who received the message depend on implementation of the method.
        Specified by:

      • update

        public boolean update(Message m)
        Description copied from interface: Observer
        This method is called whenever the observed object is changed. An application calls an Observable object's Observable.notify(Message) method to have all the object's observers notified of the change.
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Parameters:
        m - an argument passed to the Observable.notify(Message) method
        Returns:
        true if message is successfully sent

      • fail

        reason - a string containing the explanation of the failure
